input.sentences: the man is very happy on his vacation .
he is especially excited to visit these ruins .
he takes a lot of pictures but this was his favorite .
output.sentences: On vacation, a man posed in front of an old temple.
There were many carved figures in the wall, showing an intricate design.
In a doorway, it was evident that nature had also begun to join the architecture with tree roots growing around the building.
The man posed in front of another part of the ruins where an ancient jar was.
The structure towered high over the forest and was evident of an ancient civilization.
